auth.georgian_citizen: Citizen of Georgia or residence permit holder
auth.name: Name
auth.general_disclaimer_summary: Within 5 working days after registration, a representative from the vocational education institution will contact you to provide details about the program and the conditions for starting your studies. Additional documentation must be submitted personally to your chosen institution.
auth.general_disclaimer_documentation_title: Within 7 working days after registration, you must submit the following documentation to the institution where you plan to continue your studies:
auth.general_disclaimer_item_1: A copy of your identification document;
auth.general_disclaimer_item_2: A certificate confirming your secondary education (diploma or equivalent);
auth.general_disclaimer_item_3: A health certificate confirming your fitness to study your chosen profession (issued by an appropriate medical facility);
auth.terms_and_conditions_intro: We inform you that on the registration website for vocational education candidates (vet.emis.ge), for the purposes of your registration for relevant programs, your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Law of Georgia 'On Personal Data Protection'.
auth.personal_data_contact: Applicant's phone number and email address
auth.personal_data_education: Information about the applicant's achieved level of education
auth.processing_purposes_title: For what purposes do we process your data:
auth.processing_purpose_identification: For the purpose of your identification during the registration stage
auth.processing_purpose_citizenship: For the purpose of verifying citizenship status
auth.processing_purpose_status: For the purpose of establishing/verifying the existence of other status defined by legislation
auth.processing_purpose_admission: For the purpose of maintaining admission prerequisites for the relevant program
auth.special_data_educational_needs: Status of a person with special educational needs
auth.special_data_refugee: Asylum seeker, refugee or humanitarian status
auth.special_data_purposes_title: For what purposes may your special category data be processed:
auth.special_purpose_disability: Special category data is processed for the purpose of implementing the right to education for persons with disabilities and persons with special educational needs
auth.special_purpose_migration: Special category data is processed for the purpose of functioning of the unified analytical system of migration data
auth.special_purpose_legal: Processing of special category data is directly and specifically regulated by law and their processing is a necessary and proportionate measure in a democratic society
auth.data_sources_title: Where do we obtain your data from:
auth.data_source_registration: By entering data on vet.emis.ge during registration for vocational education programs
auth.data_source_state_services: From the LEPL - State Services Development Agency operating within the Ministry of Justice of Georgia
auth.data_source_social_services: From the LEPL - Social Services Agency
auth.data_source_education_systems: The management system verifies information about the applicant's achieved level of education in the information systems for general, vocational and higher education management, in case of existence of data about the applicant
auth.legal_basis_title: On what grounds do we process your data:
auth.legal_basis_text: The processing of your personal data by us is provided for by the legislation of Georgia - the Law of Georgia 'On Personal Data Protection', Order No. 42/N of July 2, 2021 of the Minister of Education and Science of Georgia 'On Approval of the Rules and Conditions for Enrollment in Vocational Educational Programs'.
auth.read_and_understand_rules: I agree and declare that I have read the above information on personal data processing

programs.completedGeneralEducationInOccupiedTerri: Did you complete secondary general education in an occupied territory in the current or previous year?
programs.seekerRefugeeOrHumanitarianStatus: Seeker of shelter, refugee, or person with humanitarian status
programs.needAdaptedEnvironment: Do you need an adapted environment for the testing/selection process?
programs.switchWarning: Please do not select 'Yes' if you do not have this status, otherwise your application to the institution cannot be processed!
programs.testReallocationNote: Please note that, in the case of testing organized by the center, the center reserves the right to reallocate the applicant to another test city/municipality.
programs.educationChangeNote: Please note that in the event of a change in education, your selected programs will be automatically cleared and you will need to re-select the program(s).
programs.georgianModuleNote: Please note that if you choose Russian, Azerbaijani, or Armenian language, you will begin the program with the Georgian language module.
programs.programAdded: The program has been added to the 'Featured Programs' level.
programs.educationChangeInfoMessage: Please note that in the event of a change in education, your selected programs will be automatically cleared and you will need to re-select the program(s).
